verbs.description: [ARG1: cavs] [V: went] [ARG4: back on agreement] [ARGM-PRD: to trade kyle korver] the cleveland cavaliers are a mess this season and kyle korver was not supposed to be a part of it according to an article by the athletic joe vardon that was published on saturday cavs gm koby altman had an agreement with korver that if lebron james ever left the team the cavs would let korver go either by buying him out or trading him kyle korver joe vardon cavs cleveland cavaliers
